snippet: Jocelyne Lamoureux scored three goals, and the United States beat Russia, 9-2, in the women’s world hockey championship to finish 3-0 in Group A play.
abstract: United States beats Russia, 9-2, in women's world hockey championship; finishes 3-0 in Group A play.
lead_paragraph: Jocelyne Lamoureux scored three goals, and the United States beat Russia, 9-2, in the women’s world hockey championship to finish 3-0 in Group A play.

headline.main: U.S. Women’s Hockey Team Beats Russia
